elements.title: Aurora Solar
elements.description: One platform for any solar project. Create a complete engineering design and sales proposal with just an address and an electric bill. Raised 250M in a round C in May 2021, from [TechCrunch](https://techcrunch.com/2021/05/24/aurora-solar-aims-to-power-the-growing-solar-industry-with-a-250m-round-c/) following a [Round A](https://techcrunch.com/2019/02/04/aurora-solars-computer-generated-installation-maps-pull-in-a-20m-series-a/) and B in the previous 2 years

elements.title: QOS energy
elements.description: monitoring and optimisation of renewable generation assets

elements.title: Solar pro tool
elements.description: Austrian software for solar panel design with 3D

elements.title: ABSolar
elements.description: Absolar is a University of Southampton spin out. Has implemented a software platform that makes an assessment of solar radiation and PV potential for the built environment

elements.title: Solargis
elements.description: Solargis provide reliable and accurate solar, weather and solar electricity data that are used in the whole lifecycle of solar power plants, from prospection to development and operation

elements.title: Solcast
elements.description: Solcast are dedicated to developing the data and tools needed to plan, construct, operate and manage solar power systems across the world.

elements.title: PVGIS
elements.description: PVGIS has been developed for more than 10 years at the European Commission Joint Research Centre, at the JRC site in Ispra, Italy. The focus of PVGIS is research in solar resource assessment, photovoltaic (PV) performance studies, and the dissemination of knowledge and data about solar radiation and PV performance.

elements.title: Sighten
elements.description: Sighten Platform for solar workflow management, from planning, financing, installation, monitoring, support
